hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT SP.PARTCIPNT_MATCH_WITHIN_CSCP FROM CATISSUE_SPECIMEN_PROTOCOL SP WHERE SP.IDENTIFIER=:id
SELECT PARTICIPANT_ID FROM CATISSUE_CLINICAL_STUDY_REG WHERE CLINICAL_STUDY_ID in (:cpIdList)

SELECT columnData.COLUMN_NAME,displayData.DISPLAY_NAME FROM CATISSUE_INTERFACE_COLUMN_DATA columnData, CATISSUE_TABLE_RELATION relationData,CATISSUE_QUERY_TABLE_DATA tableData,CATISSUE_SEARCH_DISPLAY_DATA displayData where relationData.CHILD_TABLE_ID = columnData.TABLE_ID and relationData.PARENT_TABLE_ID = tableData.TABLE_ID and relationData.RELATIONSHIP_ID = displayData.RELATIONSHIP_ID and columnData.IDENTIFIER = displayData.COL_ID and tableData.ALIAS_NAME = :participant
SELECT EMPI_ID_STATUS FROM CATISSUE_PARTICIPANT WHERE IDENTIFIER=:id
SELECT * FROM MATCHED_PARTICIPANT_MAPPING WHERE SEARCHED_PARTICIPANT_ID = :participantId AND NO_OF_MATCHED_PARTICIPANTS != 0

SELECT SEARCHED_PARTICIPANT_ID FROM MATCHED_PARTICIPANT_MAPPING PARTIMAPPING JOIN EMPI_PARTICIPANT_USER_MAPPING ON PARTIMAPPING.SEARCHED_PARTICIPANT_ID=EMPI_PARTICIPANT_USER_MAPPING.PARTICIPANT_ID WHERE EMPI_PARTICIPANT_USER_MAPPING.USER_ID=:userId AND PARTIMAPPING.NO_OF_MATCHED_PARTICIPANTS!=:noOfMatchedParticipant
SELECT SEARCHED_PARTICIPANT_ID FROM MATCHED_PARTICIPANT_MAPPING WHERE SEARCHED_PARTICIPANT_ID=:participantId
SELECT * FROM CATISSUE_MATCHED_PARTICIPANT WHERE SEARCHED_PARTICIPANT_ID=:participantId order by ORDER_NO

SELECT count(*) FROM MATCHED_PARTICIPANT_MAPPING PARTIMAPPING JOIN EMPI_PARTICIPANT_USER_MAPPING ON PARTIMAPPING.SEARCHED_PARTICIPANT_ID=EMPI_PARTICIPANT_USER_MAPPING.PARTICIPANT_ID WHERE EMPI_PARTICIPANT_USER_MAPPING.USER_ID=:userId AND PARTIMAPPING.NO_OF_MATCHED_PARTICIPANTS!=:noOfMacthedParticipant
SELECT PERMANENT_PARTICIPANT_ID FROM PARTICIPANT_EMPI_ID_MAPPING WHERE TEMPARARY_PARTICIPANT_ID=:clinPortalId
SELECT * FROM PARTICIPANT_EMPI_ID_MAPPING WHERE PERMANENT_PARTICIPANT_ID=:clinPortalId ORDER BY TEMPMRNDATE DESC
